first_para: Martin John Vickers (born 13 September 1950) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Cleethorpes at the 2010 general election.

full.extract:
Martin John Vickers (born 13 September 1950) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Cleethorpes at the 2010 general election.
^ "Martin Vickers MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ "2010 Parliamentary Elections". North East Lincolnshire Council. Retrieved 2010-05-07.
full.title: Martin Vickers
